attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: this is a petition to stop one man doors, door supervisors workin a pub/club on there own is not right. you look at a fight it takes two people to fight and there is only one door supervisor on the door. people dont go out on there own so these people that are fighting in the bar will also have friends with them. now the door supervisor is out numbered. the police would not go into this with one officer so why should door supervisors. we are asking that the law should be that there should be no less than two door supervisors to one door
